channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
channel.description:
>## [color=#00b0e0]The Archer[/color] :shield: >**Blue Dragon Killer** **Guilt (Passive)** - If you kill Blue Dragon member, you will commit suicide in following night **Piercing Arrow (Day)** - You are making sharpening arrowtip that allow you to bypass night immunity with Between the eyes Abillity - 3 uses **Between the eyes (Night)** - Choose a player at night to kill _Your objective is to Eliminate the Unseen and any Neutrals who stand against you_
>## [color=#800080]The Skirmisher[/color] :shield: >**Unseen Killer** **Reluctant (Passive)** - You will not turn into Assassin when original dies and new converted member of Unseen won't turn in Assassin until you die. **Nightshade Vial (Day)** - Choose a player at day to poison anonymously, player will be dead in following day - 3 uses **Bodyguard (Night)** - You can choose to protect Unseen member from harm, you can kill the attacker but you die succeeding _Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you_

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Knight can’t pierce through night immunity and the archer can choose to activate bypassing night immunity for tonight, although abilties that prevent the attacker to visit the target can stop the archer just like any killer types.

It’s simple BD killer type design and with experienced mind, this is force to be reckoned with. Unfortunately I haven’t thought for Cult variety yet since Cult Leader is now killer type as well I believe?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
I like the idea of a immunity piercing BD killing, but I don’t like how they can kill regular BD without facing repercussion.
So only if you kill Drunk, Noble, Prince or Princess you’ll die? But not say, if you kill a Butler or a Priest?

I also don’t see a use to its passive ability? You don’t need to state you won’t run out of arrows when running out of arrows will never happen in the first place

The converted version is useless since it does literally the same as assassin, and can’t even do anything before assassin dies meaning it might not even get to do anything all game.

See how Poacher went from a Killing to an Offensive? So he could still stay useful and not cause Unseen to get more kill power.

Sorry for ripping into this class suggestion so much D:

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
Skirmisher bypasses the entire night immunity unlike the assassin, if not entirely by Heal that fight against the poison. Skirmisher will be racking kills that no protection is safe from harm. Even Neutral Killers can’t defend against that.

No use at night while Assassin is alive or make Unseen always win from killing power alone.

As I said, Archer can have bypassing night immunity does not mean they will go on killing rampage. It’s the player that need to control themselves.

And both of them can be killed.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Frostwolf103:

It’s different than Knight and Assassin just saying.

that’s what I said
it’s less versatile

there is no reason why you would want an archer rather than a knight
knight can protect which pierces immunity on, say, a possessor that you couldn’t even find to kill as the Archer
also if the knight fucks up he dies
if the archer fucks up he kills a blue dragon and THEN has the ability to fuck up again
you can kill the Psychic, the Sheriff and the Hunter and cap it all off by killing the Prince and then yourself
the Knight is objectively better

and the Assassin is better than the Skirmisher because
A. Infinite Nightshade means infinite immunity piercing
B. You are told if your target is immune
C. If the Skirmisher is brought it when the assassin is alive he has literally no use at night
D. Assassin doesn’t get prevented from killing by being visited by the Physician

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
It’s different than Knight and Assassin just saying.

Archer doesn’t die out of suicide by killing normal BD roles, however with claim like that get you likely executed for treason and it’s worse by killing BD King, Prince and Princess will get Archer take his life out in following night, one use of Piercing Arrow is more balanced because BD won’t need Prince or execution for treason to get rid of MM and then NK in two nights and that will certainly unfair advantage with two uses.

For Skirmisher, allowing Unseen to kill two targets at single night gives them unfair advantage to thin out majority of BD quicker than Unseen and Neutral Killing combined. The Skirmisher is so talented killer that bypasses most of protection abilities except for Heal which gives Physician the counter to Skirmisher, otherwise he doesn’t require much help to eliminate the target.

I could argue to increase the uses from 1 to 2 for Piercing Arrow and 2 to 3 for Nightshade Arrow, but that might make them just OP than already is.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Archer (BD) The Skirmisher (UN)
item.dc:creator: Frostwolf103
item.description:
@Sketch This is statement that Archer / Skirmisher doesn’t check to confirm target being eliminated or alive, which that’s just for suspension by next day to find out.

Otherwise there’s no need to remind you to activate bypassing night immunity ability by next day.

Read full topic
